components.name: App Component
components.description: Root of the application, holds all other components and handles loading of assets.

components.name: RouterWrapper Component
components.description: Handles all logic for routing and navigation

components.name: Navigation Component
components.description: Sidebar view with all the logic.

components.name: HelpPage Component
components.description: Responsible for displaying the developer help view and storing describtions about each component and dependency.

dependencies.name: React Native
dependencies.description: A javascript code library based on React that lets you build native Android and iOS applications.

dependencies.name: Native Base
dependencies.description: Open source UI component library for React Native.

dependencies.name: React Router Native
dependencies.description: React Router is a collection of navigational components that compose declaratively with your application.
